property.name: Text
property.value: Flying When this card enters your field, search your main deck for an Angel resonator, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your main deck. God's Art <Rain of Arrows> {L}{L}{2}: Whenever a J/resonator you control attacks this turn, this card deals 400 damage to target resonator your opponent controls for each time J/resonators you control attacked this turn. (Play God's Art <Rain of Arrows> only once per game.)
